Beyond The Veil.card_desc: [Stasis Field] Passing through Stasis Field increases your allies' or your own Movement Speed by {scale=7|7}% for 3s.

Continuum Shift.card_desc: [Second Chance] Second Chance sends you {scale=0.4|0.4}s further into the past.

Deja vu.card_desc: [Setback] Setback becomes a lobbed explosive, capable of Rewinding multiple enemies.

Distant Memory.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your Healing received from others by {scale=5|5}% while at or below 50% Health.

Hell Hunter.card_desc: [Weapon] Generate {scale=1|1} Ammo after hitting a fully-charged weapon shot.

Infinity Engine.card_desc: [Stasis Field] Your weapon doesn't consume Ammo for {scale=1.6|1.6}s after activating Stasis Field.

Lessons of the Past.card_desc: [Setback] Gain a {scale=100|100}-Health Shield for 3s after hitting an enemy with Setback.

Life Unlived.card_desc: [Second Chance] Heal for an additional {scale=150|150} when using Second Chance.

Lost Legacy.card_desc: [Stasis Field] Heal for {scale=80|80} every 1s for 3s after activating Stasis Field.

No One Escapes.card_desc: [Setback] Enemies hit by Setback are Rewound {scale=0.3|0.3}s further into the past.

Paradox.card_desc: [Second Chance] Reduce the Cooldown of Second Chance by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Phantom Pain.card_desc: [Setback] Reduce the Cooldown of Stasis Field by {scale=1|1}s after hitting an enemy with Setback.

Ravages of Time.card_desc: [Armor] Generate {scale=2|2}% Ultimate charge after getting an Elimination.

Rewritten History.card_desc: [Stasis Field] Generate {scale=1|1} Ammo after using Second Chance.

Safe Haven.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your Healing received by {scale=6|6}% while Stasis Field is active.

Steady Arm.card_desc: [Setback] Generate {scale=1|1} Ammo after hitting an enemy with Setback.

Temporal Divide.card_desc: [Stasis Field] Greatly increase the size of Stasis Field, but its Cooldown is increased by 50%.

Unstable Fissure.card_desc: [Second Chance] Activating Second Chance leaves behind an unstable fissure that explodes after 3s, dealing 900 damage.

Alte Lektionen.card_desc: [Rückschlag] Treffer mit Rückschlag gewähren dir 3s lang einen Schild mit {scale=100|100} LP.

Alte Wunden.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=150|150} LP.

Andere Geschichte.card_desc: [Temporalbarriere] Nach Verwendung von Zweite Chance wird {scale=1|1} Munition erzeugt.

D\u00e9j\u00e0-vu.card_desc: [Rückschlag] Rückschlag wird zu einem explosiven Projektil, das einen Bogen beschreibt und mehrere Gegner gleichzeitig treffen kann.

Fast vergessen.card_desc: [Rüstung] Bei 50% oder weniger Gesundheit erhältst du um {scale=5|5}% erhöhte Heilung durch andere Spieler.

Hinter dem Schleier.card_desc: [Temporalbarriere] Gehen du oder deine Verbündeten durch die Temporalbarriere, erhöht sich euer Lauftempo 3s lang um {scale=7|7}%.

H\u00f6llenj\u00e4ger.card_desc: [Waffe] Treffer mit einem voll aufgeladenen Schuss erzeugen {scale=1|1} Munition.

Instabiler Riss.card_desc: [Zweite Chance] Bei Aktivierung von Zweite Chance wird ein instabiler Riss erzeugt, der nach 3s explodiert und 900 Schaden verursacht.

Kontinuumswechsel.card_desc: [Zweite Chance] Zweite Chance schickt dich {scale=0.4|0.4}s weiter in die Vergangenheit.

Niemand entkommt.card_desc: [Rückschlag] Rückschlag schickt Gegner {scale=0.3|0.3}s weiter in die Vergangenheit.

Paradox.card_desc: [Zweite Chance] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Zweite Chance um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Phantomschmerz.card_desc: [Rückschlag] Treffer mit Rückschlag reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Temporalbarriere um {scale=1|1}s.

R\u00fcckzugsort.card_desc: [Rüstung] Während Temporalbarriere aktiv ist, erhältst du um {scale=6|6}% erhöhte Heilung.

Temporale Teilung.card_desc: [Temporalbarriere] Temporalbarriere ist deutlich größer, aber die Abklingzeit erhöht sich um 50%.

Unendlicher Motor.card_desc: [Temporalbarriere] Nach Aktivierung von Temporalbarriere verbrauchst du {scale=1.6|1.6}s lang keine Munition.

Ungelebtes Leben.card_desc: [Zweite Chance] Erhöht die Heilung durch Zweite Chance um zusätzliche {scale=150|150} LP.

Verlorenes Erbe.card_desc: [Temporalbarriere] Nach Aktivierung von Temporalbarriere wirst du 3s lang {scale=80|80} LP pro Sekunde geheilt.

Zahn der Zeit.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen laden deine Überkraft um {scale=2|2}% auf.

Aucune \u00e9chappatoire.card_desc: [Contretemps] Contretemps renvoie les ennemis {scale=0.3|0.3}s plus loin dans le passé.

Cr\u00e9ation infinie.card_desc: [Mur de stase] Vous ne consommez pas de munitions pendant {scale=1.6|1.6}s après l'activation de Mur de stase.

D\u00e9j\u00e0-vu.card_desc: [Contretemps] Contretemps tire un projectile explosif, et peut donc atteindre plusieurs cibles.

Division temporelle.card_desc: [Mur de stase] Le Mur de stase est beaucoup plus grand mais se recharge 50% moins vite.

Douleur fant\u00f4me.card_desc: [Contretemps] Le temps de recharge de Champ de stase diminue de {scale=1|1}s si Contretemps touche un ennemi.

Fissure instable.card_desc: [Retour arrière] Retour arrière laisse à votre emplacement initial une Fissure instable qui explose après 3s en infligeant 900 dégâts de zone.

Fl\u00e9au du mal.card_desc: [Arme] Vous regagnez {scale=1|1} munition(s) par tir d'arme entièrement chargé et réussi.

Havre de paix.card_desc: [Armure] Vous recevez {scale=6|6}% de soins supplémentaires quand Mur de stase est actif.

H\u00e9ritage perdu.card_desc: [Mur de stase] Vous regagnez {scale=80|80} PV/s pendant 3s après l'activation de Mur de stase.

Le\u00e7ons du pass\u00e9.card_desc: [Contretemps] Vous obtenez un bouclier de {scale=100|100} PV pendant 3s quand Contretemps touche un ennemi.

Lointain souvenir.card_desc: [Armure] En dessous de 50% de PV, vous recevez {scale=5|5}% de soins en plus en provenance des alliés.

Nouveau continuum.card_desc: [Retour arrière] Retour arrière vous renvoie {scale=0.4|0.4}s de plus dans le passé.

Paradoxe.card_desc: [Retour arrière] Retour arrière se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite.

Par-del\u00e0 le voile.card_desc: [Mur de stase] Pour vous et vos alliés, traverser le Mur de stase augmente la vitesse de {scale=7|7}% pendant 3s.

Ravages du temps.card_desc: [Arme/Armure] Chaque élimination vous donne {scale=2|2}% de charge d'ultime.

R\u00e9alit\u00e9 potentielle.card_desc: [Retour arrière] Retour arrière vous rend {scale=150|150} PV de plus.

R\u00e9\u00e9crire l'histoire.card_desc: [Mur de stase] Vous obtenez {scale=1|1} munition(s) à l'activation de Retour arrière.

Stabilit\u00e9.card_desc: [Contretemps] Vous regagnez {scale=1|1} munition(s) quand Contretemps touche un ennemi.

Beyond The Veil.card_desc: [Stasis Field] You and allies gain {scale=10|10}% increased Movement Speed for 5s after passing through Stasis Field.

Continuum Shift.card_desc: [Second Chance] Second Chance sends you {scale=0.4|0.4}s further into the past.

Deja vu.card_desc: [Setback] Setback becomes a lobbed explosive, capable of rewinding multiple enemies.

Distant Memory.card_desc: [Armor] While below 50% Health receive {scale=5|5}% increased healing from other players.

Hell Hunter.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting fully charged weapon shots restores {scale=1|1} ammo.

Infinity Engine.card_desc: [Stasis Field] Activating Stasis Field causes you to no longer consume ammo for {scale=1|1}s.

Lessons of the Past.card_desc: [Setback] Hitting an enemy with Setback grants yourself a {scale=75|75} Health Shield for 3s.

Life Unlived.card_desc: [Second Chance] Second Chance heals you an additional {scale=150|150} Health.

Lost Legacy.card_desc: [Stasis Field] Activating Stasis Field heals you {scale=80|80} Health per second for 3s.

No One Escapes.card_desc: [Setback] Setback sends enemies {scale=0.3|0.3}s further into the past.

Old Wounds.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your base maximum Health by {scale=150|150}.

Paradox.card_desc: [Second Chance] Reduce the Cooldown of Second Chance by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Phantom Pain.card_desc: [Setback] Gain {scale=10|10}% Lifesteal against enemies hit by Setback for 5s.

Safe Haven.card_desc: Receive {scale=6|6}% increased healing while Stasis Field is active.

Steady Arm.card_desc: [Setback] Hitting an enemy with Setback restores {scale=1|1} ammo.

Temporal Divide.card_desc: [Stasis Field] Stasis Field is several times larger, but its cooldown is increased by 50%.

Unstable Fissure.card_desc: Activating Second Chance leaves behind an unstable fissure that after 3s explodes dealing 900 damage.

Brazo Firme.card_desc: [Revés] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición tras golpear a un enemigo con Revés.

Cazador infernal.card_desc: [Arma] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición tras acertar con un disparo de arma totalmente cargado.

D\u00e9j\u00e0 vu.card_desc: [Revés] Revés se convierte en un explosivo con trayectoria en arco capaz de rebobinar a varios enemigos.

Desplazamiento Continuo.card_desc: [Segunda oportunidad] Segunda oportunidad te envía {scale=0.4|0.4}s más hacia el pasado.

Divisi\u00f3n temporal.card_desc: [Campo de estasis] El tamaño del Campo de estasis aumenta en gran medida, pero su recarga aumenta un 50%.

Dolor Fantasma.card_desc: [Revés] Se reduce la recarga de Campo de estasis en {scale=1|1}s tras alcanzar a un enemigo con Revés.

Fisura inestable.card_desc: [Segunda Oportunidad] Activar Segunda oportunidad deja una fisura inestable que explota tras 3s infligiendo 900 PS de daño.

Heridas viejas.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=150|150} PS.

Lecciones del pasado.card_desc: [Revés] Consigues un escudo de {scale=100|100} PS durante 3s tras golpear a un enemigo con Revés.

Legado Perdido.card_desc: [Campo de estasis] Te curas {scale=80|80} PS cada 1s durante 3s tras activar Campo de estasis.

Los estragos del tiempo.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu habilidad definitiva se recarga un {scale=2|2}% tras conseguir una eliminación.

M\u00e1s all\u00e1 del velo.card_desc: [Campo de Estasis] Al atravesar un Campo de estasis, tu velocidad de movimiento o la de tus aliados aumenta {scale=7|7}% durante 3s.

Memoria lejana.card_desc: [Armadura] La curación que recibes de otros aumenta un {scale=5|5}% si tienes un 50% o menos de salud.

Motor Infinito.card_desc: [Campo de Estasis] Tu arma no consume munición durante {scale=1.6|1.6}s tras activar Campo de estasis.

Nadie Escapa.card_desc: [Revés] Revés envía a los enemigos {scale=0.3|0.3}s más hacia el pasado.

Paradoja.card_desc: [Segunda oportunidad] Se reduce la recarga del Segunda oportunidad en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Reescribiendo la historia.card_desc: [Campo de Estasis] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición tras usar Segunda oportunidad.

Refugio.card_desc: [Armadura] La curación recibida aumenta un {scale=6|6}% mientras está activa Campo de estasis.

Vida sin Vida.card_desc: [Segunda oportunidad] Te curas {scale=150|150} PS adicionales al usar Segunda oportunidad.

Atrav\u00e9s do v\u00e9u.card_desc: [Campo de Estase] Atravessar o Campo de Estase aumenta em {scale=7|7}% a velocidade de movimento sua e dos seus aliados por 3s.

Bra\u00e7o Est\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Retrocesso] Gera {scale=1|1} de munição após atingir um inimigo com o Retrocesso.

Ca\u00e7ador do Inferno.card_desc: [Arma] Gera {scale=1|1} de munição após atingir um inimigo com um disparo totalmente carregado da arma.

D\u00e9j\u00e0 vu.card_desc: [Retrocesso] O projétil do Retrocesso agora descreve um arco e é explosivo, capaz de retroceder inúmeros alvos.

Desola\u00e7\u00e3o do Tempo.card_desc: [Armadura] Carrega {scale=2|2}% da suprema após conseguir uma eliminação.

Divis\u00e3o do Tempo.card_desc: [Campo de Estase] O Campo de Estase é muito mais largo, mas seu intervalo é 50% maior.

Dor Fantasma.card_desc: [Retrocesso] Reduz o intervalo do Campo de Estase em {scale=1|1}s após atingir um inimigo com Retrocesso.

Fenda na Continuidade.card_desc: [Segunda Chance] Segunda Chance te manda {scale=0.4|0.4}s mais distante no passado.

Fissura Inst\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Segunda Chance] Ativar a Segunda Chance deixa para trás uma fissura instável que explode após 3s, causando 900 de dano.

Hist\u00f3ria Reescrita.card_desc: [Campo de Estase] Gera {scale=1|1} de munição após usar Segunda Chance.

Legado Perdido.card_desc: [Campo de Estase] Você se cura em {scale=80|80} de vida a cada 1s por 3s após ativar o Campo de Estase.

Li\u00e7\u00f5es do Passado.card_desc: [Retrocesso] Ganha um escudo com {scale=100|100} de vida por 3s após atingir um inimigo com Retrocesso.

Mem\u00f3ria Distante.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta em {scale=5|5}% a cura que receber de outros, enquanto estiver com 50% ou menos de vida.

Motor Infinito.card_desc: [Campo de Estase] Sua arma não consome munição por {scale=1.6|1.6}s após ativar o Campo de Estase.

Ningu\u00e9m Escapa.card_desc: [Retrocesso] Inimigos atingidos pelo Retrocesso são enviados {scale=0.3|0.3}s mais longe no passado.

Paradoxo.card_desc: [Segunda Chance] Reduz o intervalo de Segunda Chance em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Ref\u00fagio Seguro.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta em {scale=6|6}% a cura recebida enquanto o Campo de Estase estiver ativado.

Vida n\u00e3o vivida.card_desc: [Segunda Chance] Você se cura em {scale=150|150} a mais de vida ao usar Segunda Chance.

\u0412\u0435\u0447\u043d\u044b\u0439 \u0.card_desc: [Стазисное поле] После активации Стазисного поля ваше оружие не расходует боеприпасы {scale=1.6|1.6} с.

\u0412\u0440\u0435\u043c\u0435\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Стазисное поле] Стазисное поле становится значительно больше, но перезаряжается на 50% дольше.

\u0414\u0430\u043b\u0435\u043a\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 50% и ниже вы получаете от других на {scale=5|5}% больше исцеления.

\u0414\u0435\u0436\u0430\u0432\u044e.card_desc: [Шаг назад] Шаг назад превращается во взрывной снаряд и может переместить в прошлое нескольких врагов Перемоткой.

\u0417\u0430 \u0437\u0430\u0432\u0435\u0.card_desc: [Стазисное поле] Когда вы и ваши союзники проходите через Стазисное поле, ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=7|7}% на 3 с.

\u041d\u0435\u043f\u0440\u043e\u0436\u04.card_desc: [Второй шанс] Использование Второго шанса исцеляет вас еще на {scale=150|150} ед.

\u041d\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0430\u0431\u04.card_desc: [Второй шанс] Активация Второго шанса создает нестабильный разлом, который взрывается через 3 с. и наносит 900 ед. урона.

\u041e\u0445\u043e\u0442\u043d\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Попадание полностью заряженным выстрелом генерирует {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u041f\u0430\u0440\u0430\u0434\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Второй шанс] Перезарядка Второго шанса сокращается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u041f\u0435\u0440\u0435\u043f\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Стазисное поле] Второй шанс генерирует {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u0421\u0434\u0432\u0438\u0433 \u0432 \u.card_desc: [Второй шанс] Второй шанс отправляет вас на {scale=0.4|0.4} с. дальше в прошлое.

\u0421\u043f\u0430\u0441\u0435\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Шаг назад] Шаг назад отправляет врагов на {scale=0.3|0.3} с. дальше в прошлое.

\u0421\u0442\u0430\u0440\u044b\u0435 \u0.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=150|150} ед.

\u0422\u0432\u0435\u0440\u0434\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Шаг назад] Попадания по врагу Шагом назад восстанавливают {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u0423\u0431\u0435\u0436\u0438\u0449\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Пока действует Стазисное поле, вы получаете на {scale=6|6}% больше исцеления.

\u0423\u0440\u043e\u043a\u0438 \u043f\u0.card_desc: [Шаг назад] При попадании по врагу Шагом назад вы получаете щит прочностью {scale=100|100} ед.

\u0423\u0442\u0435\u0440\u044f\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Стазисное поле] Активация Стазисного поля исцеляет вас на {scale=80|80} ед. в секунду в течение 3 с.

\u0424\u0430\u043d\u0442\u043e\u043c\u04.card_desc: [Шаг назад] Попадание Шагом назад сокращает перезарядку Стазисного поля на {scale=1|1} с.

Bezpieczne schronienie.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa otrzymywane przez ciebie leczenie o {scale=6|6}%, gdy Pole zastojowe jest aktywne.

B\u00f3l fantomowy.card_desc: [Przeniesienie] Trafienie Przeniesieniem skraca czas odnowienia Pola zastojowego o {scale=1|1} s.

Deja vu.card_desc: [Przeniesienie] Przeniesienie strzela eksplodującym pociskiem lecącym lobem, który może przenieść w czasie kilku wrogów.

Lekcje przesz\u0142o\u015bci.card_desc: [Przeniesienie] Trafienie wroga Przeniesieniem zapewnia ci tarczę o odporności {scale=100|100} pkt. na 3 s.

\u0141owca z piek\u0142a rodem.card_desc: [Broń] Trafienie w pełni naładowanym strzałem z broni wytwarza {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji.

Nieprze\u017cyte \u017cycie.card_desc: [Druga szansa] Przywraca ci dodatkowo {scale=150|150} PZ podczas korzystania z Drugiej szansy.

Niestabilna szczelina.card_desc: [Druga szansa] Aktywacja Drugiej szansy wytwarza niestabilną szczelinę, która po 3 s eksploduje, zadając 900 obrażeń.

Nikt nie ucieknie.card_desc: [Przeniesienie] Wrogowie trafieni Przeniesieniem zostają cofnięci o {scale=0.3|0.3} s dalej w przeszłość.

Odleg\u0142e wspomnienie.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa otrzymywane od innych leczenie o {scale=5|5}%, jak długo twój poziom zdrowia nie przekracza 50%.

Paradoks.card_desc: [Druga szansa] Skraca czas odnowienia Drugiej szansy o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Perpetuum mobile.card_desc: [Pole zastojowe] Aktywacja Pola zastojowego powoduje, że nie zużywasz amunicji przez {scale=1.6|1.6} s.

Pewna r\u0119ka.card_desc: [Przeniesienie] Trafienie wroga Przeniesieniem wytwarza {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji.

Podzia\u0142 czasowy.card_desc: [Pole zastojowe] Znacznie zwiększa obszar Pola zastojowego, ale jego czas odnowienia zostaje wydłużony o 50%.

Przesuni\u0119cie ku kontinuum.card_desc: [Druga szansa] Druga szansa cofa cię o {scale=0.4|0.4} s dalej w przeszłość.

Stare rany.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa poziom maks. zdrowia o {scale=150|150} PZ.

Utracone dziedzictwo.card_desc: [Pole zastojowe] Przywraca ci {scale=80|80} PZ co 1 s przez 3 s po aktywacji Pola zastojowego.

Za zas\u0142on\u0105.card_desc: [Pole zastojowe] Przejście przez Pole zastojowe zwiększa szybkość ruchu twoją lub sojusznika o {scale=7|7}% na 3 s.

Zafa\u0142szowana historia.card_desc: [Pole zastojowe] Generuje {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji po użyciu Drugiej szansy.

Cehennem Avc\u0131s\u0131.card_desc: [Silah] Tam yüklü bir silah atışı ile vurduktan sonra {scale=1|1} Cephane oluştur.

\u00c7eli\u015fki.card_desc: [İkinci Şans] İkinci Şans'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5} sn azaltır.

Deja vu.card_desc: [Terslik] Terslik, birden çok düşmanı Geçmişe Götürebilen patlayıcı bir atışa dönüşür.

Dengesiz \u00c7atlak.card_desc: [İkinci Şans] İkinci Şans etkinleştirilince 3sn sonra patlayarak 900 hasar veren dengesiz bir çatlak oluşur.

Ge\u00e7ici Ayr\u0131l\u0131k.card_desc: [Durağan Alan] Durağan Alan'ın boyutu büyür ancak Bekleme Süresi de %50 artar.

Ge\u00e7mi\u015fin Verdi\u011fi Dersler.card_desc: [Terslik] Terslik ile bir düşmanı vurduktan sonra 3sn boyunca {scale=100|100} Canlık bir Kalkan kazan.

G\u00fcvenli S\u0131\u011f\u0131nak.card_desc: [Zırh] Durağan Alan etkinken aldığın İyileştirmeyi %{scale=6|6} artır.

Hayali Ac\u0131.card_desc: [Terslik] Terslik ile bir düşmanı vurduktan sonra Durağan Alan'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1}sn azalt.

Ka\u00e7\u0131\u015f Yok.card_desc: [Terslik] Terslik vurduğu düşmanları {scale=0.3|0.3}sn daha Geçmişe Gönderir.

Kay\u0131p Miras.card_desc: [Durağan Alan] Durağan Alan'ı etkinleştirdikten sonra 3sn boyunca her 1 saniyede {scale=80|80} Can İyileş.

Perde Arkas\u0131.card_desc: [Durağan Alan] Sen ve müttefiklerin Durağan Alan'dan geçtikten sonra 3sn boyunca %{scale=7|7} Hareket Hızı kazanırsınız.

Sa\u011flam Silah.card_desc: [Terslik] Terslik ile bir düşmanı vurduktan sonra {scale=1|1} Cephane üret.

Sonsuzluk Motoru.card_desc: [Durağan Alan] Durağan Alan'ı etkinleştirdikten sonra silahın {scale=1.6|1.6} sn boyunca cephane harcamaz.

S\u00fcrey De\u011fi\u015fimi.card_desc: [İkinci Şans] İkinci Şans seni {scale=0.4|0.4} sn daha geçmişe gönderir.

Uzak Hat\u0131ra.card_desc: [Zırh] %50 Can veya altındayken diğerlerinden aldığın İyileştirmeyi %{scale=5|5} artır.

Ya\u015fanmam\u0131\u015f Hayat.card_desc: [İkinci Şans] İkinci Şans kullanırken ek {scale=150|150} Can daha İyileş.

Yeniden Yaz\u0131lan Tarih.card_desc: [Durağan Alan] İkinci Şans kullandıktan sonra {scale=1|1} Cephane oluştur.

Zaman\u0131n Tahribat\u0131.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptıktan sonra Ultini %{scale=2|2} doldur.
